name: Meowy's Motel
description:
You're a bounty hunter and you've finally tracked down your sworn nemesis and your ticket to $100,000 to a strange motel in the sky. You don't know how you got here nor can you recall what happened the night before. All you know is that He is close and you will stop at nothing to capture him- even if it meant busting down the doors of every resident here- no matter how strange they may be. 

W, S, A, D to move

SPACE to jump

C to crouch
